name: GWENT: The Witcher Card Game
notes:
Unfortunately you'll have to install Gwent manually through GOG Galaxy.

Game launches but black screen after loading.
content:
files:
- gog: https://cdn.gog.com/open/galaxy/client/setup_galaxy_1.2.49.26.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: /runWithoutUpdating /deelevated
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/GOG Galaxy/GalaxyClient.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts vcrun2012 vcrun2013 vcrun2015 win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: gog
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
